dissolve_shape

FUNCTION_DESCRIPTION

dissolve_shape(in_object, byvar, var_as_NA = FALSE)

Arguments

in_object

PARAM_DESCRIPTION
byvar

PARAM_DESCRIPTION
var_as_NA

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: FALSE

Value

OUTPUT_DESCRIPTION

Details

DETAILS

See also

as_data_frame

Examples

# NOT RUN {
if(interactive()){
 library(sprawl)
 library(sprawl.data)
 indata    <- read_vect(system.file("extdata","lc_polys.shp", package = "sprawl.data"))
 byvar     <- "category"
 out_shape <- dissolve_shape(indata, byvar)
 out_shape
 }
# }
